import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import ContactServices from '../../ContactServices/ContactServices'; const ViewContact = () => { let {contactId}=useParams(); let[state, setState]=useState({ loading:false, contacts:[], errorMessage:"" }) useEffect(()=>{ let promise=new Promise((res, rej)=>{ let response=ContactServices.getContact(contactId); res(response) rej("error") }) promise.then((res1)) },[contactId]) return (
